dict.string: Sonora records your voice memos. Recordings are saved on your device. Audio is sent securely for transcription.
Sonora can add calendar events you approve to keep you on track.
Sonora can add reminders you approve to help you follow through.
Sonora needs full calendar access to add and manage events you choose.
Sonora needs write access to add events you choose without reading your existing calendar.
Sonora needs full reminders access to add and manage reminders you choose.
Sonora needs write access to add reminders you choose without reading your existing reminders.
